ugtm.ugtm_classes¶

Defines classes for initial and optimized GTM model.

Classes

InitialGTM(matX, matM, n_nodes, …) Class for initial GTM model.
OptimizedGTM(matW, matY, matP, matR, …) Class for optimized GTM model.
ReturnU(matU, betaInv)
